name: smdm-slide-menu
author: Jakob Osterberger <jo@studiomitte.com>
description: A library agnostic multilevel page menu with a smooth slide effect based on CSS transitions

scripts.pre-version: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run format && npm run build
scripts.post-version: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.version-patch: npm run pre-version && npm version patch --force -m "[RELEASE] patch version %s"
scripts.version-minor: npm run pre-version && npm version minor --force -m "[RELEASE] minor version %s"
